sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"美丽的，漂亮的"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: beautiful, fair, handsome, lovely, pretty, fine
means: beautiful ： 普通用词，含义广泛，语气最强，指优美和谐，是一种几乎接近完美的美。指人时通常形容女人或小孩，很少用于描写男子。
fair ： 正式用词，多用于文学中，形容女子和儿童，侧重外表的美。
handsome ： 多用于描写男性的英俊潇洒。有时也形容女人，指其五官端正，体态秀丽。
lovely ： 普通用词，描写人时，主要指女人和小孩的相貌，语气不如beautiful强。
pretty ： 普通用词，语气比beautiful弱，多用于描写妇女、儿童以及小巧玲珑，精美可爱之物。
fine ： 指在容貌、身材或风度等方面令人感到可爱。用于事物时，强调形式或内容的优美。

sentence.Network_en: It's been a beautiful evening and you have made it all possible.
sentence.Network_cn: 那是个美好的夜晚，你让一切成为可能。

sentence.Network_en: That's a beautiful piece of work. You should be proud of it.
sentence.Network_cn: 那件作品非常漂亮，你应当为之自豪。

sentence.Network_en: Each one of these ancient towns is hauntingly beautiful.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些古镇个个都美得令人难以忘怀。

encyclopedia.content: 歌 手：张咪 语 言：国语专辑1CD 公 司：北京东方影音 日 期：2005.10.06 精致女人心情 全力展现创作才华 别样张咪震撼出击 一头散发着地中海气息的栗色秀发，一身经过热那亚湾热风吹拂过的茶褐肤色，1米73的高挑身材，完美的三围曲线，张咪给人的印象就像一只慵懒而性感的猫咪。而在我眼中，她更像是一块散发着浓郁醇香的巧克力，充满着不可抗拒的诱惑力，却又在转身之后，值得细细回味。 张咪要出新专辑了，名字就叫做《beautif

entry.def: A beautiful person is very attractive to look at.

example.ex: She was a very beautiful woman...
To me he is the most beautiful child in the world.
example.tran: 对我来说，他是世界上最美丽的孩子。

entry.def: If you describe something as beautiful, you mean that it is very attractive or pleasing.
You can describe something that someone does as beautiful when they do it very skilfully.

means.word_mean: 1. delighting the senses or exciting intellectual or emotional admiration;

Sentence.sentence: They are really pretty little towns with lots of old housesand beautiful tree-lined streets.
It is a beautiful little town.

They weren't looking for cured meats, organic produce or beautiful presentation; they were looking for whatever they could get their hands on, and this prioritisation of quantity over quality prevailed for decades, meaning a generation was brought up with food that couldn't compete with neighbouring France, Italy, Belgium or Spain.
It is situated at the foot of a beautiful mountain.
enjoy the beautiful view of the countryside

jushi.english: Great composers have written beautiful music we like to hear again and again.
jushi.chinese: 伟大的作曲家谱写的优美音乐,我们喜欢听了又听。
